personal.title: That I am?
personal.text: Welcome to my portfolio. Basicaly I'am Janderson Gois and I'm a braziliam Front-end developer. To know more about me you can click in the button bellow to be redirected to personal info page.

tecnologies.title: Tecnologies
tecnologies.text: On this page I used the most basic of Front-end technology because I believe I need to be good at the basics at least. I know other technologies like React, jQuery and a little Back-end. Here you will find more about how I use these front-end technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: Having knowledge is certainly important, but it's no use if I don't tell you what I'm good at.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: A place where you can find all the information about my projects, how they were developed and the technologies behind the magic.

cookies.text: For you better experience, this app can use cookies.
